description.value:
The fine black powder has a bitter smell and burns the skin.

Make an attack: Ranged 2/5; +12 vs. Fortitude; the target is blinded until the end of your next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends). Creatures that do not rely on sight to detect other creatures are immune to the blinding effect, and instead suffer the aftereffect as the initial effect, with no subsequent aftereffect.

Alchemical Item

Make an attack: Ranged 2/5; +12 vs. Fortitude; the target is blinded until the end of your next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends). Creatures that do not rely on sight to detect other creatures are immune to the blinding effect, and instead suffer the aftereffect as the initial effect, with no subsequent aftereffect.
